org.openimaj.image.pixel.statistics

Interface PixelProfileModel<I extends org.openimaj.image.Image<?,I>>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - Concrete type of Image
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FStatisticalPixelProfileModel, MBFStatisticalPixelProfileModel

    public interface PixelProfileModel<I extends org.openimaj.image.Image<?,I>>
    Interface for classes capable of building "models" of pixels along a line.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float computeCost(I image, org.openimaj.math.geometry.line.Line2d line)
      Compute the cost of a vector of samples extracted along a line in the given image to the internal model.
      float computeMovementDistance(I image, org.openimaj.math.geometry.line.Line2d line, int numSamples, Point2d pt)
      Compute the distance between the centre of the given line and the given point, normalised as a function of the length of the sampling line.
      Point2d computeNewBest(I image, org.openimaj.math.geometry.line.Line2d line, int numSamples)
      Extract numSamples samples from the line in the image and then compare this model at each overlapping position starting from the first sample at the beginning of the line.

      Update the model with a new sample.

    • Method Detail

      • updateModel

        void updateModel(I image,
               org.openimaj.math.geometry.line.Line2d line)
        Update the model with a new sample.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to extract the sample from
        line - the line across with to sample

      • computeNewBest

        Point2d computeNewBest(I image,
                     org.openimaj.math.geometry.line.Line2d line,
                     int numSamples)
        Extract numSamples samples from the line in the image and then compare this model at each overlapping position starting from the first sample at the beginning of the line. numSamples must be bigger than the number of samples used to construct the model. In addition, callers are responsible for ensuring the sampling rate between the new samples and the model is equal. The point on the line corresponding to the smallest Mahalanobis distance is returned.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to sample
        line - the line to sample along
        numSamples - the number of samples to make
        Returns:
        the "best" position on the line

      • computeCost

        float computeCost(I image,
                org.openimaj.math.geometry.line.Line2d line)
        Compute the cost of a vector of samples extracted along a line in the given image to the internal model.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to sample
        line - the line to sample along
        Returns:
        the computed cost

      • computeMovementDistance

        float computeMovementDistance(I image,
                            org.openimaj.math.geometry.line.Line2d line,
                            int numSamples,
                            Point2d pt)
        Compute the distance between the centre of the given line and the given point, normalised as a function of the length of the sampling line.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to sample
        line - the line to sample along
        numSamples - the number of samples to make
        pt - the point to compare
        Returns:
        the normalised distance (0 means same point; 1 means on end of line)
